name: Dawex Systems
membership:
Cap Digital http://www.capdigital.com
Big Data Value Association http://www.bdva.eu
goal:
Dawex is a global data marketplace where organizations meet, buy and sell data, directly and securely. Acting as a trusted third-party, we operate on a transactional-based revenue model.
Our goal is to contribute to the Data Economy by facilitating cross border data flow and making data exchange accessible and secure for all economic stakeholders.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Digital Single Market
Building a European Data Economy
Free Flow of non-personal data
General Data Protection Regulation
Horizon 2020
